oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Claim by Joseph Carter for damages by Confederate army
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Claim in Cannon County for "Quartermaster stores"--a bay mare--under a Act of the Tennessee General Assembly Feb. 19, 1868 "to secure to the Loyal Citizens of TN, recompense from the US Govt for losses incurred by the Rebellion." Carter, a 41-year old resident of Cannon County is applying for $150 for a mare taken by Jordan Hays "recruiting a reg[iment] for the Rebbel army he taken the mare to mount his men." Witnessed by William Ready & Joseph D. McKnight.
